mapper.select: SELECT wtg.id, wtg.group_id, wtg.group_name, wtg.group_tag_type, wtg.create_by, wtg.create_by_id, wtg.create_time, wtg.update_by, wtg.update_by_id, wtg.update_time, wtg.del_flag, wtg.owner FROM we_tag_group wtg where wtg.del_flag=0 and wtg.group_tag_type=#{groupTagType} and wtg.group_name like concat('%',#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ORDER BY wtg.create_time DESC
